text: 3.16: Ro 10.3; 1 Ko 15.51; 1 Te 4.15Ana kheri gavi, nta zam kha kameŋ nzuai. Khueŋ guigira, kha gavir ki buni mbari, nta ntɨɨriveŋ za kɨrar hɨgi fhuvara. Nza nta ntɨɨriveŋ kaŋgi zav, nta nzuav ŋaara mbatɨga mbui. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, bigi kaŋgi fhuv gumgi gum mba Zisas Krais khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk havhargi fhuv gumgi, mbe pham kha buni bun nzuav, vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki buni, mbe vhɨra pham nta nzuai. Mbe maaŋ mbui, mbe nduarira warira farfagi, mbe za mbatɨgirga.
